rules_text:
When Winks, Private Eye enters, investigate.
{1}, Sacrifice an artifact: Exile Winks face down with a cover counter on it. 
Undercover [i](You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. When it dies while face down, exile it face down without revealing it and put a cover counter on it. Players may look at and cast face down cards they own exiled with cover counters.)[/i]
notes:
+scout type, U —> W, New effect — This card’s last effect didn’t really synergize into the archetypes of either W or U.

Check wording
